reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Don't buy this product. It only records when your phone is on and the record app stays open. So you can't do nothing else with your phone except staying on the recording app with your phone on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little camera
reviews.reviewText: In case you missed it in the description...its magnetic! I take it to the gym with me to record pics and video while I'm working out. It just sticks right to the Smith Machine or other nearby machine or rack. It does come with a little magnetic swivel mount that you could use as well. The only thing that would make this camera any better is making it WiFi capable paired with a mobile app to view on your phone. You have to plug it into your laptop to view the images/video. P.S. Motion detection is the absolute best option for extending SD space and battery life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars What I didn't like
reviews.reviewText: I didn't know that I had to get a card for it or a cip

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Could not get camera to function as advertised.
reviews.reviewText: I bought twomof these thinking they would help with security issues around my home. After spending several hours trying everything I could try to get the camera into the on position as described in the extremely poor set of instuctions ( lots of questionable and confusing series of combined button functions that did not work)...I would strongly suggest avoiding a purchase of this particular camera. Im sending both back to Amazon and going to try another system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t come with memory card
reviews.reviewText: Greta product but doesn’t come with memory card, I had to delay usage for awhile

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t include Everything
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t use this camera. Once I realized it was sent missing a component ( Micro SD card ), which I would have to purchase separately, it just made my purchase too complex. Simplify please!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars do not waste your time
reviews.reviewText: Inferior on all counts. Terrible software, terrible hardware, hard to set up even more difficult to manage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mini spy camera
reviews.reviewText: Love the camera size, easy to use. I only wish the instructions were printed a little larger, it was hard to read the small print.
